completeListOfAbilities.name: BRV Attack
completeListOfAbilities.desc: Magic attack\nSteals enemy's BRV

completeListOfAbilities.name: HP Attack
completeListOfAbilities.desc: Expends BRV to deal HP damage

completeListOfAbilities.name: Light of the Crystal
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV
Self: 3 turns Light of the Crystal buff
Instant turn rate
Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning、 support
BRV Attack becomes Tranquil Light、 HP Attack becomes Hurl Staff while Light of the Crystal buff active

ailments.name: Light of the Crystal
ailments.desc: Light of the Crystal: Raises party's MAX BRV; restores a certain amount of party's HP; raises own ATK (does not stack)

passives.name: Light of the Crystal Attack Up
passives.desc: After using Light of the Crystal:\n • Slightly raises ATK for 1 turn
passives.short_desc: Light of the Crystal Attack Up: Raises ATK

passives.name: Chain Bonus
passives.desc: Deals slightly more BRV damage when using chain attacks
passives.short_desc: Chain Bonus: Increases BRV damage dealt

passives.name: Buffed Attack
passives.desc: Slightly raises ATK with active buffs

passives.name: Bravery Crystal Generation
passives.desc: After using Crystal Generation:\n • Slightly raises BRV

passives.name: Speed Buff
passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD with active buffs

passives.name: Charged Light of the Crystal
passives.short_desc: Charged Light of the Crystal: Raises use count of Light of the Crystal

passives.name: Buff Boost
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV with active buffs

passives.name: Charged Crystal Generation
passives.short_desc: Charged Crystal Generation: Raises use count of Crystal Generation

passives.name: Living Out Eternity
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV、 SPD while Light of the Crystal buff active
passives.short_desc: Living Out Eternity: Raises MAX BRV、 SPD

passives.name: Buffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Light of the Crystal Extension
passives.desc:
When using Light of the Crystal:
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on own MAX BRV

When using Tranquil Light:
 • Moderate boost to BRV granted based on own ATK

When using Hurl Staff:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
passives.short_desc: Light of the Crystal Extension: Boost to Light of the Crystal

passives.name: All Buff Boost Speed
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV、 SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: All Buff Boost Speed: Raises party's MAX BRV、 SPD

passives.name: Crystal Generation Extension
passives.desc: When using Crystal Generation:\n • Moderate boost to BRV granted based on ATK、 extended to party
passives.short_desc: Crystal Generation Extension: Boost to Crystal Generation

passives.name: Destruction Resonance
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Destruction Resonance: Raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: All BRV Rejuvenate Extension
passives.desc: When using All BRV Rejuvenate:\n • Slight boost to BRV granted based on own MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: All BRV Rejuvenate Extension: Boost to All BRV Rejuvenate

passive.name: All BRV Rejuvenate Growth
passive.desc:
All BRV Rejuvenate use +1

When using All BRV Rejuvenate:
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on own MAX BRV
passive.short_desc: All BRV Rejuvenate Growth: Boost to All BRV Rejuvenate

passive.name: Enveloping Light
passive.desc: When using Light of the Crystal:\n • Boost to BRV granted based on MAX BRV\n • Light of the Crystal buff boost、 duration+
passive.short_desc: Enveloping Light: Boost to Light of the Crystal

passive.name: Mother Crystal
passive.desc: When using Crystal Generation:\n • Boost to BRV granted based on ATK\n • Triggers additional group HP attack per each non-KO'd ally based on individual current BRV (deals proportionate HP damage to each target)
passive.short_desc: Mother Crystal: Boost to Crystal Generation

passive.name: Crystal Creation Power
passive.desc: May equip EX ability Crystal Core Wave
passive.short_desc: Crystal Creation Power: May equip Crystal Core Wave

passives.name: Crystal Core Wave Buff Up
passives.short_desc: Crystal Core Wave Buff Up: Light of Creation boost

passives.name: Crystal Core Wave Buff Longer
passives.short_desc: Crystal Core Wave Buff Longer: Light of Creation duration+

passives.name: Crystal Core Wave Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Crystal Core Wave
